projects.name: EngReji - AI Powered Learning Platform
projects.summary: Research-driven AI learning platform empowering rural Bangladeshi students to improve spoken English through real-time multimodal feedback on pronunciation and fluency.
highlights: Designed multimodal AI feedback system integrating ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition), NLP, and TTS for comprehensive speech analysis.
Built scalable Python backend with advanced open-source AI models and APIs for real-time pronunciation assessment.
National Recognition: Finalist in Bangladesh Blockchain Olympiad 2025 (AI Category), Honorable Mention, and shortlisted at JavaAIFest (powered by TherapBD).

projects.name: OptiTask - Emotion-Aware Productivity System
projects.summary: Task management platform leveraging NLP-driven emotion analysis and AI chatbot for personalized, empathetic user support.
highlights: Integrated Gemini API with Stanford NLP for user emotion analysis and context-aware, empathetic responses.
Implemented real-time collaboration using React, Node.js, and Socket.io for seamless team coordination.
Won 1st place (Poster Category) out of 150+ teams at UIU Fall Project Show 2024.

projects.name: Autonomous Car Parking System
projects.summary: Reinforcement Learning-based autonomous vehicle system bridging simulation and hardware deployment for self-parking capabilities.
highlights: Trained RL agent using Deep Q-Learning to perform autonomous parking tasks in Unity simulation.
Integrated simulation control with real-world Arduino vehicle deployment via custom REST APIs.
Awarded 3rd runner-up among 100+ teams at UIU Project Show, Summer 2024.

projects.name: VoteChain - Decentralized Voting Platform
projects.summary: Blockchain-based voting system exploring decentralized architecture, wallet authentication, and secure smart contract execution.
highlights: Developed decentralized voting platform with MetaMask wallet-based authentication.
Implemented smart contract logic using Solidity for transparent and immutable vote recording.
Built with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Web3.js for seamless blockchain integration.
